title: So why is TT only available on weekends?
body: I don't understand why, I wanna be able to play it way more often

replies.body:
Limited queue roster.

Because it is a less popular game mode, during times when a lower volume of people are playing, queue times would either be too long, or would mismatch to the point of having diamonds vs bronzies.

It's actually a sensible precaution.
welcome to oce how may i help you today
